name.ja: <ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>帝<rt>てい</rt></ruby>リンドルム

requirement.en: You have no cards in your Extra Deck during the turn you Tribute Summoned this card in Attack Position.

effect.en: Shuffle up to 2 cards from your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck. Then, you can make 1 face-up Effect Monster on your opponent's field lose 800 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Triumphant Return of the Monarchs
Structure Deck: Triumphant Return of the Monarchs
